messages.title: THEY LIED!
messages.content: Labour, Tories and Lib Dems all promised the British people a say on the EU... now they've changed their minds and refuse us this right.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP demands a referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union. They mention EU membership is costing the UK £40 million a day, call for control over borders and immigration, and argue EU laws are made to the detriment of British lives.

issues.brexitEurope: UKIP demands a referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union.
issues.economy: EU membership costing the UK £40 million a day.
issues.governance: Laws made by the EU overrule our own.
issues.immigration: EU control of our borders and immigration.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, Freepost RLSU-HZBG-UBBC, Unit 1 King Charles Business Park, Old Newton Rd, Heathfield, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ12 6UT

images.caption: UKIP campaign leaflet demanding a referendum on EU membership.
